item.title: Report X-2024121169
item.description:
Report X-2024121169

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-19
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY THREE POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING LOBSTER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS AND LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM ARIZONA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER AK1138, ANGIES LOBSTER, 150 MAIN ST, RICHMOND ME 04357-1152.

item.title: Report X-2024120887
item.description:
Report X-2024120887

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-15
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE FROM CHINA TO THE USA WAS DISCOVERED BURNING AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE KENTUCKY. UPON INSPECTION THE THERMAL TRACKING LABEL STATES PI 967 SECTION II WITH A DESCRIPTION OF LENOVO COMPUTER. THE PACKAGE CONTAINS ONE E14 GEN 6 THINKPAD. INITIAL INVESTIGATION REVEALS THE PACKAGE HAD CAUGHT FIRE AFTER BEING DAMAGED DURING TRANSPORTATION WHILE TRAVELING ON THE CONVEYOR BELTS AND ROLLERS. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM CHINA MAINLAND UNDER UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 925290, LCFC (HEFEI) ELECTRONICS TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD, $(SPB-A) NO. 3188-1, YUNGU ROAD, ECONOMIC, HEFEI CHINA MAINLAND 230601. A TELEPHONE REPORT WAS MADE TO THE NATIONAL RESPONSE CENTER ON 15-DECEMBER-2024 UNDER NRC 1418974.

item.title: Report X-2024120843
item.description:
Report X-2024120843

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-13
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY THREE AIR PACKAGES WERE INSPECTED AFTER THEY FELT COLD TO THE TOUCH. ADDITIONALLY ON THE BOTTOM PART OF EACH THERMAL TRACKING LABEL TWO PACKAGES HAVE A DESCRIPTION OF "ICE AT BOTTOM". ONE PACKAGE HAS A DESCRIPTION OF "ICE ON W". UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED EACH PACKAGE CONTAINS APPROXIMATELY TWO POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING FOOD. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS TO ADDITIONAL CONSIGNEES IN NEVADA 1Z6V41060251517952 AND 1Z6V41060201502561. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOXES.

item.title: Report E-2024120195
item.description:
Report E-2024120195

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-29
  • City: CATLETTSBURG
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING LOADING OPERATION, DRIVER NOTICED A SLIGHT LEAT AT THE HORSHOE FITTING. FURTHER INSPECTION REVEALED A BAD GASKET. LOADING OPERATION CEASED. TRAILER TRANSPORTED TO NEARBY SATELITE TERMINAL FOR REPAIR. SPILL CLEANED BY PLANT PERSONELL.
